name: Woofinstein II: The Mini Colossus
description:
RATED #1 ON THE POLYSTATION COUNTERFEIT JAM

"IT'S TERROR-PUPPY EVERYBODY! SHOOT HIM!"

#polystationjam17

a parody to Wolf2

Blast your way in with your wild canine senses and destroy every Nazi on your way.

Pick up that gun. 

Throw it or shoot some Nazis. 

Kill DE FRAU.

GET OUT.

CONTROLS

W-A-S-D  for movements

Right click to throw your gun and take a gun

Left MB to shoot 

Credit: Programming by ZBG

*ALPHA RELEASE
